metadata.name: UAC Bypass Using IDiagnostic Profile - File
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a file by "dllhost.exe" in System32 directory part of "IDiagnosticProfileUAC" UAC bypass technique

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\dllhost.exe')) AND startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.dll')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a file by "dllhost.exe" in System32 directory part of "IDiagnosticProfileUAC" UAC bypass technique
